title: may 9: the watergate scandal
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the Watergate Scandal. After, she remembers the Canadian hit “American Woman.” Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
